page.title: 08Eastrop Park in Basingstoke
page.content: We went to{Eastrop Park,}it is very good there with lots to look at, {benches}to sit on,{two small lakes}and pretty flowers, which I think{old {people}would like to look at. There are lots of things to{play}on too. On one lake there was a{swan}and four {ducklings. }Some{children sailed}their {model boats}on the other lake. When we had had a good look around we had our{picnic lunch. }We saw a man{raking the lake. He told us that it was his job to keep the lake free of{litter. The water was very{dirty}but I could see some{tadpoles}and little{fish. The{activities}for children are {swings, slides}and a{rope climbing {frame}called a{spider. }I thought this was great, it was made of{red rope}and was very{bouncy. }It was shaped like the{Eiffel tower. }The{toilets}there were convenient. By Katy Bates.
